ygData.subject: Re: Out gunned
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I disagree.  That s the situation where an Enchanter really shines.  Wizards can help, but not as well. Our best bet in that situation is Evac. ... If
ygData.messageBody:
--- mstokes <mstokes@...> wrote:
> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
> >
> > Not really...if your fighting a steady stream of
> blues your not going to
> > have the mana to keep up with the fighters...in
> that kinda situation your
> > best use is to sit back and let a blast on the
> tougher ones to soften them
> > up and wait for when the crap hits the fan and you
> get a bad pull...
>
> Absolutly, as a wizard, you are the groups panic
> button. Fighting a steady
> stream of blues, a group that includes a cleric will
> almost have no use for
> us until the puller yells, "Oh Shit, I pulled
> something big guys, get
> ready" That is when we shine. With our burns,
> nobody can save the situation
> faster than a wizard.
>
I disagree. That's the situation where an Enchanter
really shines. Wizards can help, but not as well.
Our best bet in that situation is Evac.
> >
>
> Hehe, wrote my comment before reading your next
> comment, I guess we agree
> :) One more point is that many classes get a
> version of root. If you are
> going to burn the mob into oblivion make sure they
> know to use it.

If you're grouped with a Druid or Ranger, just forget
Root. Have them use Snare. It's resisted much less,
and works a lot better.

Enstill is good for crowd control, but, again,
Enchanters are much better at this than we.

At least, it did up until a couple of months ago. I
haven't grouped with either of those classes in a
really long while.
>
